info.name: UniTrack Attendance System - Complete API
info.description:
Comprehensive API collection for UniTrack Attendance System with FAQ management, Support system, Enhanced Session management and Analytics.

## üÜï New Features Added:

### FAQ Management:
- ‚úÖ Get all FAQs with pagination and filtering
- ‚úÖ Get FAQ categories with counts
- ‚úÖ Create, update, delete FAQs (Admin only)
- ‚úÖ Bulk FAQ creation
- ‚úÖ FAQ view tracking

### Support System:
- ‚úÖ Submit support requests with priority levels
- ‚úÖ Get support info and guidelines
- ‚úÖ FAQ system integration
- ‚úÖ Email notifications to all admins
- ‚úÖ User confirmation emails
- ‚úÖ Rate limiting for support requests

### Enhanced Session Management:
- ‚úÖ Get all lecturer sessions (active/inactive)
- ‚úÖ Detailed session analytics
- ‚úÖ Session statistics and attendance data
- ‚úÖ Time-based analytics and trends

## üîê Authentication Flow

### New User Registration:
1. **Register Teacher** - Creates account with OTP
2. **Verify Registration** - Complete registration with OTP
3. **Login** - Access the system

### Unverified User Flow:
1. **Login Unverified User** - Triggers new OTP
2. **Request New Verification Code** - Get fresh OTP if needed
3. **Verify Email with OTP** - Complete verification and login

### Existing User Flow:
1. **Login Teacher/Admin** - Direct login for verified users
2. **Request Password Reset OTP** - If password forgotten
3. **Verify OTP and Reset Password** - Complete password reset

### Security & Validation:
- ‚úÖ Enhanced CORS support
- ‚úÖ Comprehensive input validation
- ‚úÖ Rate limiting on sensitive endpoints
- ‚úÖ Admin authentication for protected routes
- ‚úÖ Email verification required for teachers
- ‚úÖ Admins are auto-verified
- ‚úÖ OTPs expire after 1 hour
- ‚úÖ Welcome emails after verification
- ‚úÖ Enhanced email templates with expiry times
- ‚úÖ OTPs stored in user models (not separate collection)
